titles.title: Insurance Form Simplification Act

To amend title 5, United States Code, to require the use of standardized claim forms under the health benefits program for Federal employees, and to amend title 10, United States Code, to require the use of such forms in the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services.
